newsitem.title: UK: SOCCER-ENGLAND DEFEAT SOUTH AFRICA 2-1 IN FRIENDLY.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-ENGLAND DEFEAT SOUTH AFRICA 2-1 IN FRIENDLY.

text.p: England defeated South Africa 2-1 in a friendly international at Old Trafford on Saturday.

England: 1-Nigel Martyn; 2-Philip Neville, 4-Martin Keown, 5-Gareth Southgate, 3-Stuart Pearce, 6-Graeme Le Saux (16-David Beckham 68), 7-Jamie Redknapp (14-David Batty 56), 11-Robert Lee (15-Nicky Butt 80), 8-Paul Gascoigne (12-Sol Campbell 90), 9-Ian Wright, 10-Teddy Sheringham (17-Paul Scholes 65)

South Africa: 1-Andre Arendse; 2-Sizwe Moutaung, 5-Mark Fish, 9-Neil Tovey, 19-Lucas Radebe, 15-Doctor Khumalo, 21-Eric Tinkler (Shaun Bartlett 85), 18-John Moeti, 10-John Moshoeu, 6- Philemon Masinga (8-Linda Buthelezi 85), 12-Brendan Augustine (14-Jerry Sikhosana 54).
